site_name: Sitarey Court And Shabana Court FormerlyRhodes HouseAustralia RoadWhite City EstateLondonW12 7PQ
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation to the S106 Agreement attached to planning permission reference: 2000/02938/FUL dated 3rd May 2001. Seeking to vary the provisions of clause 5.5.  That clause 5.5 be amended so that everything from the heading 'except that if' be deleted and replaced instead with the following: 'except that if the freehold or leasehold title to the whole or any part of the Site is vested in a Registered Social Landlord, and such Registered Social Landlord has granted a mortgage or charge over the Site or any part of the Site then the restrictions in this clause shall not be binding on any mortgagee or chargee of the Registered Social Landlord (or any receiver (including an administrative receiver) appointed by such mortgagee or chargee or any other person appointed under any security documentation to enable such mortgagee or chargee to realise its security or any administrator (howsoever appointed) including a housing administrator (each a Receiver)) or any persons or bodies deriving title through such mortgagee or chargee or Receiver'.
